resources.string: Head northwest on Topeliuksenkatu/Topeliusgatan toward Eino Leinon katu/Eino Leinos gata

First, click SEARCH bar on top of the screen to enter destination address. To speak to the app, click PRESS AND TALK on the lower part of the screen. If address is right, it will take you to the map. Press START TO ROUTE button on the bottom of map screen to see direction. For live view, press SEE LIVE VIEW button on the bottom of route screen. Press BACK button anytime to go back to previous screen on the top left hand corner. When finish navigating, click ADD TO FAVORITE on the bottom of screen. To exit the app, click EXIT on the navigation bar. For Help, use command EXIT with voice assistance or press EXIT button on the lower navigation bar.
